document_data.name: Windriders
document_data.mainbody: The '''Windriders''' were an all-but-retired mercenary company based in [[Chondath]].
document_data.History: They fought during the war against the [[arcanaloth]] [[Yrkhetep]] and were decisive in defeating the yugoloth's army in [[Hades]].
document_data.Contracts: By [[1358 DR]], the Windriders worked only for the glory.
